name: Light of Foliar Incision
title: Whitemoon Bristle: Light of Foliar Incision
desc: "If you believe that he yet has the potential to reclaim his honor in the maze, then guide him to break off the pale branch...\nOnly then can the bright moon and the newborn stars grant him pure wisdom and help him shed his bitter memories and desires."
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a Normal Attack: Create 1 random basic Elemental Die. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round)

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses a Normal Attack: Create 1 random basic Elemental Die. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round) (Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
